title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream, completed by the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams. Many people come to see a seal in a dream completed in a complete dream, so we lay out everything for you, dear followers, in terms of complete knowledge of the interpretation of printing on paper in a dream See the seal and signature. In a complete dream and the interpretation of a dream with stamped paper, as well as the interpretation of a seal. The passport in a dream is complete in a complete dream for a pregnant, married or pregnant woman, as well as for men. If you are interested in what is the interpretation of seeing a seal, then you should read the article. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a sealWhat a seal dreams of in a dream Ibn Sirin shows the dreamer's desire to achieve many goals and aspirations in his life. Seeing a completed ruler's seal in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will gain a high and lofty position in society. A leaf seal in a dream indicates that the dreamer's desires and desires will be fulfilled, in addition to easy access to... What he aspires to. Seeing a seal on people’s faces in a dream indicates God’s wrath upon people because of many immoralities and sins. Seeing a seal in a dream is generally a vision that bodes well for the dreamer and hearing some good news. Seeing a seal and signature in a dream Why dream of sealing a white paper and signing it in The dream suggests that the dreamer will acquire a new job that will benefit him. Also, seeing a seal and a chain in a dream completed for someone who is not married yet is a sign of his imminent marriage, and God will grant him that. A complete ink seal in a dream. Why dream of a seal in a dream filled with a sick person - news of an imminent recovery From illness and correcting circumstances. Seeing the seal of goodness and the fulfillment of the dreamer are among the ancient desires that he longs for and expects until God Almighty fulfills them for him. Why dream of printing on paper? Seeing a money seal in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money from currency. In the coming period. The interpretation of seeing a stamp on colored paper in a completed dream shows some kind of forbidden money that the dreamer receives in exchange for inappropriate work. Printing on official papers in a dream is a sign of prosperity, kindness, and wonderful opportunities that will satisfy the dreamer in his life. A complete passport stamp in Dream: Seeing the seal on the entire passport in a dream is one of the desired visions, indicating change and improvement in living conditions. Seeing the entire seal of the passport in a dream indicates an upcoming journey that the dreamer will enter for the sake of goodness and justice. What is the dream of stamped paper? Seeing stamped paper Completely in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will reach some of the places he wants to reach. It is also a testimony to get rid of stress, get rid of suffering, and keep haters and haters away from it. title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband smoking a hookah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a husband smoking a hookah in a dream in interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a husband smoking a hookah in a dreamIn the event that you see a husband smoking a hookah in a dream, this may indicate many serious disagreements between them. It is possible that you will buy if I saw a husband eating a hookah in a dream. It could indicate changes that are happening in their lives at that time and they have to ask God for help. It is possible that seeing a husband smoking a hookah in a dream indicates a problem with her husband in his workplace, and God knows best. In the event that you saw your husband smoking a hookah in a dream This may indicate that he is going through a financial crisis that he may face for a long time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with your husband’s family in a dream: Eating fish with your husband’s family in a dream may indicate that they are going through a period of small disputes and that they will end soon. This dream may indicate The suffering that the woman’s family suffers during this time and they must seek God’s help. This vision may indicate easy childbirth if the woman is pregnant or the childbirth is approaching. This dream may be an indication of changing events and an extensive diet that will happen to them in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband asking me to eat in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband is asking her for food, this may indicate his need for help during this time. A husband asking a woman for food in a dream may indicate that she is a greedy person who wants to take everything. The dream may indicate That the husband asks his wife for food in a dream indicates financial problems that he may face and that he wants to get rid of them in those days. It is possible that seeing the husband asking for food in a dream indicates some changes that are happening to him at this time, and God knows best. A dream in which he eats the husband’s head in a dream may indicate a lot of money that a woman can gain during this period. It is possible to see yourself eating Your husband’s head in a dream, which indicates many arguments and discussions that occur between them during those days. This dream could indicate big changes in their lives and they must ask God for help. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me food in a dream: Seeing the husband giving food to his wife in The dream may indicate the great goodness that the wife will receive during this period. It is possible that a woman’s dream of her husband serving her food in a dream indicates the comfort that she will gain greatly during this period, thanks to God. Seeing the husband offering food to his wife in a dream may indicate The stability in which they live at this time, and God knows best. If you see the husband offering food to the wife in a dream, this may indicate the end of the dispute and problems that arose between them in the previous period. Dreaming that the husband is offering food to his wife in a dream may indicate marital stability and stability.

title: Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Shoes in a dream Seeing shoes in a dream has many meanings and connotations, including good and happy occasions and others that lead to evil and sadness. We will show you all the points related to the dream of shoes in the following article. Shoes in a dream The interpretation of the dream of shoes for the dreamer has many meanings and connotations, the most important of which are: If a person sees in his dream that he is wearing one shoe and is not walking in it, this is a clear indication that he will meet his life partner in the near future. Interpretation Dreaming of one shoe in a person’s dream means that he will be separated from the person he loves. If a person sees in his dream that he is wearing only one shoe with his clothes, then God will change his circumstances from difficulty to comfort and from distress to comfort. Shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained many The meanings associated with the dream of one shoe are as follows: The great scholar Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in his dream that he is wearing one pair of shoes, this is a sign that he will divorce his wife. If a person sees in his dream a piece of shoe, then this dream does not deserve praise and expresses a sign of illness. And the emergence of health problems. A shoe in a single woman’s dream. A single shoe in a single woman’s dream has many meanings and connotations, the most important of which is: Seeing a person wearing one shoe and leaving the other on means that he cannot manage his life properly. If a virgin sees in her dream that she is wearing two different shoes on her feet, then this Clear evidence of confusion and distraction in reality, and the dream also expresses that her partner will be bad and misbehave, so she should. eager. Wearing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees shoes in her dream, this dream is not good and expresses her inability to reach her dreams and ambitions due to many obstacles and difficulties that stand in her way. If a virgin is engaged and she sees in her dream that she is wearing shoes, This vision is not good and expresses a broken engagement due to the incompatibility between them in reality. Stealing shoes in a dream. Condolence: The interpretation of a dream about stealing shoes in a Virgin’s dream indicates that she is irresponsible, reckless, and has a lot of indifference, which leads her to trouble. If a girl sees in her dream that her partner He is the one who stole her shoes, so this is clear evidence that she is surrounded by people who pretend to love her, conspire against evil and want to harm her, so she must be careful. Looking for one shoe in a dream for a single woman. If the dreamer is single and sees in her dream that she is looking for her lost shoe, then this is a clear indication. However, she cannot achieve her dreams and aspirations. Shoes in a dream for a married woman. Simple shoes in a married woman’s dream have many meanings and symbols, which are: Wearing shoes in a dream for a married woman. If the dreamer is married and sees in her dream that she is wearing only one shoe, this is a clear indication that there is A great danger that one of her children will pass through in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes in a dream for a wife means that she is living a miserable and troubled marital life due to incompatibility with her partner. Losing shoes in a dream for a married womanInterpretation

title: What is the complete interpretation of sweeping in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you a complete interpretation of a wide staircase in a dream. Dreaming about sweeping in general is one of the visions that indicate many things that we learn from this article, as well as the comprehensive vision in the dream in general. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping stairs for married women, elderly women, and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in knowing the correct and logical interpretation, you should follow the article. Why does Ibn Sirin dream of sweeping? If you dream that you are sweeping in general, as the great scholar Ibn Sirin said in his book, that this indicates in some cases the emergence of unpleasant things, as in a dream A sick person, this may be a sign of death. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping someone else's house may indicate the dreamer losing money, which is a sign of poverty and loss in trade, instead of sweeping garbage and cleaning in a complete dream, which is one of the good visions that indicate benefits. Read also: Why do you dream of seeing a broom in a dream full of women and men? Why do you dream that you are sweeping Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq talked about seeing the sweeper in a dream completely, and it is one of the visions that indicates the origin of many things, and this indicates the abundance of money and good deeds in the world. The world, benefiting others, and caring for women. Also, seeing sweeping and complete cleaning in a dream of a sick person brings death closer to that person and also indicates experiences, sadness, separation from loved ones and also indicates loss. See also: Why dream of seeing a threshold in a dreamWhy dream of a lonely woman sweeping The broomWhy does an unmarried girl dream that she is sweeping someone else’s house in a complete dream is good news for her about her upcoming marriage and this is a vision that indicates her relief from her sadness and achieving what she wants in life. In addition, seeing a single girl in a dream completely sweeping her father’s house with a vacuum cleaner is The news of her good fortune and her transition to a new happy life will benefit her and also indicates success and prosperity. Why does an unmarried girl dream of sweeping a neighbor’s house in a complete dream is evidence of many livelihoods that she will have and indicates that she will find a new job and start a happy and stable life. Watch Also: Why do you dream of cleaning the bathroom in a complete dream? Why do you dream of a married woman sweeping the stairs? The scene of a married woman sweeping her house shows the poverty and helplessness that awaits her in her next life and shows many of the problems that the woman suffers from in her married life. Why does a married woman dream of sweeping the stairs in a complete dream shows She tells her that she is moving to a new house and the patient shows severe fatigue from which she will suffer and may indicate her death. Some interpreters have said that what it means to see a married woman sweeping up the stairs indicates the anxiety and pain that she will feel and may indicate her expulsion from the home and the woman’s desire to approach God for a solution. Her problems. ...See also: Why dream of seeing a staircase in a completed dream for a man and a woman? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a deformed girl, and interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a beautiful girl

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl: A dream about giving birth is one of the dreams in which the common people find a sign of gaining livelihood or increasing knowledge, and it carries many interpretations, each of which depends on a set of circumstances for the condition of each fortuneteller. To be interpreted correctly and to determine its meaning and reflection as well as real life. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a girl according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a girl? In giving birth to a girl in a dream, there is a group of good news that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, gave good news to man about the birth of his child, so the woman It is more valuable. The Companions in his hadith, may God bless him and grant him peace. Although scholars differ in interpreting this dream according to the factors surrounding the dreamer, such as the mood and circumstances he was going through before seeing this dream, it is evidence of abundant livelihood and happiness in most or most interpretations. Thus, the girl in a man’s dream is the collapse of worries and relief. The close person that he heralds, or a sign of the approaching joy that he preaches to himself or his closest family. It can express the happiness that the divine is experiencing in the recent period and heralds the continuation of this happiness and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a girl according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream about the birth of a girl is An expression of what her birth represents in reality, good news and an increase in the livelihood of the fortuneteller or the person to whom the child was born as a father. If the dreamer embraces a baby girl in a dream immediately after her birth, the interpretations express his attachment to the opportunities available to him, most of which will bring good in family life or at work Giving birth to a girl in a dream can express the change of bad circumstances into better ones. In general, childbirth in a dream is a sign of new provision and the beginning of a happy life, and in particular the birth of a girl is a sign of provision in this life. If the dreamer is suffering from debts that have overwhelmed him, and he sees in his dream the birth of a girl, then it is good news that his worries will go away and his debts will be paid. He will find Your dream can be interpreted in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl. The birth of a girl in a dream for unmarried people heralds an improvement in the dreamer’s situation, because it expresses the unmarried girl’s closeness to God and the good reputation with which people know her. It also has an effect in achieving something that she seeks in life. Life, such as success in her studies or a promotion in her job for the better. Some scholars interpret this as her imminent marriage to a good man who fears God within her, and that this marriage will bring goodness and blessings to the livelihood of both spouses. The interpretation of seeing the birth of a child in a girl’s dream could be a sign of the beginning of The age of puberty and that this topic occupies her mind to a large extent, this vision easily brings goodness to her at this stage. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a child for a married woman. The birth of a girl in a dream for a married woman carries signs of stability with her husband and her good circumstances as a mother raising her children. It is an indication of the purity of insight and the preservation of Her husband. Price. It may portend her imminent pregnancy and that she will have a beautiful daughter who will be kind to her and her father. The interpretation of a girl’s birth in general in a dream may indicate offspring.

title: Interpretation of a hat in a dream - Seeing a hat in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about a hat indicates security, happiness, comfort, and other interpretations, and we interpret it for a single woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as wearing a hat and dressing. Buying or losing dirty and torn white or black red hats by Ibn Sirin, Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq and others. The meaning of a hat, beret or beret in general indicates safety, security, emotional and mental maturity, and it is also a harbinger of happiness and improvement in material circumstances. Seeing the dreamer wearing a hat in his dream and his admiration for it and his determination Not wearing another, this is auspicious for stability, good condition, and sound decision on the practical or emotional level. Wearing a clergy hat, whether Christian or Jewish, is a sign of bright ideas, available opportunities, honesty and chivalry, and the same interpretation applies to seeing an imam or sheikh wearing the turban. preview.html: In this article, we will provide an interpretation of the vision in the case of each person and find out the opinion of interpreters about seeing onions in a dream from our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for a single girl. Among the auspicious visions in an unmarried girl’s dream is: seeing green onions planted in the ground. Because it is news about the good and happy news that you are about to hear. Seeing a single girl in a dream that she is preparing white onions for cooking. Evidence of an abundance of sustenance, blessings, and many good things to come. The vision shows her marriage to someone who pushes her to create. White onions in a dream for a single girl is goodness and happiness. And joy, God willing. Onions in a dream for an unmarried girl indicate preparations for marriage. One girl cutting onions in a dream is good news about her future relationship. The vision also indicates that this channel will hold a wedding and prepare for it. Chopping onions in a dream for an unmarried girl is appropriate. A happy one is being held in her house. An unmarried girl who buys onions in her dream is good news that she is getting a lot of money. A girl picking one onion in a dream means that she is in good health. And when she gets onions from someone she knows, it means that they are cooperating together in Good job. The general fortuneteller received onions in a dream, which means blessing and abundance in the diet. See also: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing onions in a dream for a married womanEating onions in a married woman’s dream may indicate unpleasant interpretations.In a dream A married woman may indicate that she hears sad news, and God knows best. When a married woman takes onions from someone in a dream. Evidence of this person’s hatred and hatred for this woman. Green onions in a dream for a married woman, indicates the death of sorrows and worries. And he will gain a lot of goodness. After hardship and fatigue. A married woman who sees green onions in her dream is evidence of her wealth after she has put effort into her work. Green onions in a dream are married, children and money, God willing. Red onions mean that her husband deceived her. A married woman cuts a lot of onions in a dream, evidence On a lot of money. If a married woman is sick and eats onions in a dream. And the vision means her death, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. White onions in a dream, married, exhaustion and instability. But if someone gives her onions in a dream, then this person hates her and hates her. A dream about onions is married. And money and wealth. If you take onions from someone in a dream, you will get a promotion at his job. If her husband is in debt, she can pay off his debt. Or her husband will get a promotion at work or a bonus. A married woman taking onions from her husband in a dream means that there will be A problem between them. Green onions are the death of worry and sadness. When a married woman carries an onion she cannot eat it. Evidence of his wealth, but after toil and work at work. Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man buys onions in his sleep from the market. Good news of obtaining a lot of money from

title: Interpretation of the appearance of the name Amna in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name Amna in a dream. The name Amna is one of the Arabic names given to females. The name Amna can appear in a dream. So what is it? Seeing the name Amna in a dream is for both women and men, and whether the woman is pregnant, single or married. Interpretation of seeing the name Amna in a dream. Amna in a dream for a married womanDream interpretation scholars have suggested many interpretations related to seeing the name Amna in a dream. Among the indicators related to his vision of a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream could be good news for her that she will enjoy success and live abundantly. If her life with her husband has problems, then it is good for her that the differences between them end. If there are problems between her and her relatives, this is a sign of Those problems are gone. Also, this dream may indicate the stability of her life with her husband as well as her children. If a woman finds a sick person in her family, this is a sign of recovery from her illness, God willing. And if they find anxiety, this is good news for them that their fears have begun to fade. If If there is someone in her family who has debts, she will gladly pay off the debts. Also, seeing the name Amna in a married woman’s dream is evidence of money and a lot of livelihood for the woman or her husband. And if a married woman sees in her dream that she gave birth to a girl and named her Khazna, then this is evidence of her abundant livelihood. In general, the name Amna in a married woman’s dream has a good future for her and her family. It is also an indication that her life will be free of problems and conflicts. See also: Dream interpretation of the name Abdullah in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the name Amn to a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman dreams in her dream of seeing the name Amina, it has connotations that are closely linked to her pregnancy and birth, as well as to her baby, and the connotations of this are: This is a sign for her that her pregnancy will be easy and that the pregnancy period will be free of difficulties and problems that she may face in reality. In addition, seeing the name Amina In a pregnant woman’s dream, it may indicate that her fetus will be in good health after birth. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Adel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The name Amina in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman’s vision of the name Amina in her dream has many connotations related to her situation and life, and it is mostly enjoyable for her and gives her pleasure. And comfort and reassurance, and these indicators are: Seeing it in a dream shows the beautiful personality of this woman. It can also indicate that the divorced woman enjoys love and appreciation from those around her. Moreover, seeing the name Amna in a dream for a divorced woman indicates that the problems she is suffering from in her life The reality has passed. This vision also indicates that the one who had the vision will achieve goodness in the coming days. This relief will come to her in her next life. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see the name Swad in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of a dream about the name Amna in a dream. There are many indicators that indicate if one sees The name Amna in a woman’s dream and these indicators are: putting an end to the worries and problems that a single woman suffers from. In addition, this may indicate that she has gone through a difficult stage.

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a traffic accident?

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about a car accident: Seeing accidents is an unpleasant vision for many lawyers. The accident was interpreted as destruction and mourning, instability of conditions, and a succession of crises and fears. The jurists agreed to see the survival of the accident, and what concerns us in this article is to mention all the details and concerns. Signs of seeing a car accident, as we show situations that differ from one person to another and affect the context of the dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident: Seeing the accident expresses the fears that reside in the heart, self-talk, anxiety about the future, negative feelings and thoughts that surround the soul and head, and fear of confrontation and danger. Anyone can take risks at work, and be exposed to serious damage because of that. Whoever sees an accident while driving, this is a warning to him to stay away from recklessness and recklessness in performing tasks and achieving goals, as accidents express the obstacles and obstacles that stand between the dreamer and his desires and intentions. The railway accident indicates To misfortune, anguish, loss of hope and extreme despair. If the fortuneteller and his family are exposed to an accident, this indicates deteriorating conditions and they are going through bitter experiences, and their condition may worsen due to wrong decisions and corrupt beliefs. If the accident was with an unknown person, this indicates harsh and useless circumstances and experiences, and the vision is praiseworthy in The case of surviving an accident, and the vision indicates well-being, security, repentance, and taking advantage of opportunities. And returning things to normal. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a car accident. Ibn Sirin did not address the interpretation of the car in the dream, but we can discern his interpretation of some visions related to the accident and the vehicle, and we mention them in the following points: Ibn Sirin believes that the accident indicates the calamity that befell its owner and what followed. Of serious damage and losses. His desires that expose him to destruction. Seeing an accident also expresses lack of money, loss of prestige and prestige, loss of job and work, and the accident symbolizes recklessness and reckless behavior, mishandling of problems and crises, deterioration of living conditions, and low status among people. Whoever sees that he is exposed to an accident, He falls into a conspiracy against him or becomes a victim of those who conspire against him, and sudden incidents turn into psychological shock, psychological conflicts, shocking news, disturbances in life, and excessive anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident for individuals: Seeing the accident symbolizes a deep disagreement between her and her partner and a state of tension regarding her relationship with others. If she sees the car overturning, this indicates a qualitative shift in her life, and her morals, characteristics, and relationships with others may change. If she sees that she died in an accident, this indicates harm. The seriousness and punishment imposed on her. As a result of her actions and behavior. If you see a car crashing, this is a sign of those who wronged her and took away her rights. If the accident was strange to her, this is a sign of the mistreatment she is receiving from others, and the difficulty of adapting to it. And coexistence with the current circumstances. What is the interpretation of a dream about surviving a car accident for single people? This vision indicates that the dreamer overcame the difficulties and challenges that stood in her way, and her success in life

title: Interpretations of healing for seeing a zebra in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a zebra in a dream is one of the dreams that can cause panic for people, because the zebra is a sign of distress and loneliness, and there are hidden meanings in the interpretation of the zebra in the dream, and most of these opinions differ. Due to the number of cases in which a zebra is in a dream, and seeing a zebra accompanying a person in addition to seeing it chasing him, a difference in interpretations has arisen from the different cases, and a difference of opinion has also arisen from the difference in interpretation of the vision, so let us learn together the therapeutic interpretations of seeing a zebra in a dream Through our distinguished Egyptian website. Interpretation of a dream about a zebra in a dream. Seeing a zebra in a dream indicates a lot of hostility and hatred. Riding a zebra in a dream is transgressions and sins. Seeing a zebra in a dream for an unmarried girl means delay in marriage and inability to bear responsibilities. Difficult, and she may have to be careful about approaching a bad person. Donkey milk in a dream is a long journey and a lot of money for the dreamer. Eating zebra meat means that corruption will occur in his life. In a married woman’s dream, a donkey indicates the many problems and fears that the fortuneteller suffers from. Seeing a zebra in The dream is a marriage to a person who has a good reputation, good character and religion. A zebra in a dream indicates happiness and great compensation from God. Riding a white donkey in a dream is the approach of marriage. A black donkey in a dream is nothing but happiness and joy for her and her family. Killing a zebra in a dream It is nothing but a big problem and sadness for the girl, and she can get rid of it by God’s command. Riding a zebra means getting money and one can mean having a position at work or being very successful in studies. The result of seeing a big zebra in a dream in a married woman’s dream is evidence On happiness and kindness towards her and her husband, because it indicates strong feelings, love and affection between them. If a married woman sees a zebra in her dream, this indicates justice, obedience, good character and religion, and that woman will bear good seed. A white donkey in a dream is a good relative without fatigue. If A married woman hearing the sound of a donkey in her dream indicates injustice and corruption. A pregnant woman seeing a zebra is great psychological pain and suffering, and the vision can indicate many health problems and crises that affect pregnancy and childbirth. A pregnant woman riding a donkey in a dream means The imminent birth and the safety of herself and her unborn child. A white donkey for a pregnant woman is a good vision that heralds joy and comfort. The color of a black donkey indicates poverty of money and great psychological damage. Scientists see dreams that a black donkey for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth to a male or female if she sees a white donkey. A running donkey in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good relative to earn a living. Interpretation of seeing a zebra in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if one sees a zebra in his dream, this indicates the presence of a stranger in the dream.
